title: Al Berto Liberty, There For The Taking

sources.title: Al Berto Liberty, There For The Taking
sources.description: Synopsis Biographical film about the life of Portuguese poet Al Berto. Al Berto: Liberty, there for the taking Directed by: Vicente Alves do Ó Date of birth: 2 January 1972, Setúbal, Portugal Writing credits: Vicente Alves do Ó Music by: Pedro Janela Country: Portugal Language: Portugese Color: Color Runtime: 120 minutes Released: 2017 Genre: Drama Al Berto: Liberty, there for the taking A Biopic about the life of Portuguese poet Al Berto by Vitor Pinto, Cineuropa 02/10/2017 Liberty was there for the taking, but people had not been taught to be free and were not sure exactly what to do with it. Vicente Alves do Ó focuses on the youth of Portuguese poet Al Berto , in a character-driven film set against the backdrop of post-revolutionary Portugal. Portuguese director Vicente Alves do Ó has a penchant for poets. Previously, he directed the biopic of female author Florbela Espanca ( Florbela ). Now he is back with a film focused on the figure of Al Berto , a cult name in Portuguese literature who died 20 years ago, at the peak of his fame.
